CustomField.defaultValue: IF ( $RecordType.Name = "Program Team","decisions risks blockers milestones participants", "decisions risks blockers")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Status reports for this team, allows you to specify the sections that should be displayed in that report and the order they should be displayed in. Use a space to separate each section. May include: decisions risks blockers milestones participants
CustomField.label: Status Report Sections
